alert.note: Alert for St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 19 at 1:53PM AKDT until March 21 at 6:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 PM AKDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow with blizzard conditions at times. Total snow accumulations of 6 inches. Winds gusting to 60 mph. Visibility less than one quarter mile at times. * WHERE...St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 6 PM AKDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could cause whiteout conditions. Large snow drifts will form. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Blizzard conditions are expected to develop at St Lawrence Island late tonight, and in the Bering Strait early Monday morning. Blizzard conditions are expected to continue into Tuesday. Very strong winds are expected early Monday. Winds may decrease Monday afternoon, but will increase again Monday night. Winds are expected to decrease slowly on Tuesday.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible.

area.areaDesc: St Lawrence Island and Bering Strait Coast
